recipesJson.name: Latte de Lavande et Caramel Salé
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description: Wanted to take it back to the off-the-wall roots for Fresh03. I decided to go the latte route. The only "coffee" flavor I really have that I enjoy is Purilum. So I built the base off that. The anise is at 1 drop in the mix, its very strong. You can also not use it, it is just there to play with the lavender.

pageContext.name: Latte de Lavande et Caramel Salé
